    • conformsTo

      public boolean conformsTo(String type1, String type2)
      Must be given types that exist Checks if type 1 conforms to type 2 (type 1 is a subclass of type 2) or if they are primitive, checks if they are equal. Gives error messages if either are false
      Parameters:
      type1 -
      type2 -
      Returns:
      true if no errors are found
